title: Senior Software Engineer
description: We are looking for a senior software engineer with experience in web development and knowledge of JavaScript, React and Node.js. The ideal candidate should be able to work in a team and have good communication skills.

title: Data Analyst
description: We are looking for a data analyst with experience in handling large datasets and visualization tools. Knowledge of SQL, Python and R is required.

title: Mobile Developer
description: We are looking for a mobile developer with experience in iOS and/or Android. The candidate should have knowledge in Swift, Kotlin and user interface development.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: We are looking for a DevOps engineer with experience in managing cloud infrastructure, automation of processes and continuous integration tools. Knowledge of AWS, Azure or GCP is required.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We are looking for a UI/UX designer with a passion for creating exceptional digital experiences. Experience in Figma, user-centered design and collaboration with development teams is required.

title: Database Administrator
description: We are looking for a database administrator with experience in PostgreSQL and MySQL. The candidate should ensure the availability, security and performance of production databases.

title: Cybersecurity Specialist
description: We are looking for a cybersecurity specialist with knowledge in protecting infrastructure, vulnerability analysis and incident response. Experience with SIEM and security certifications is valued.

title: Product Manager
description: We are looking for a product manager with experience in defining and launching digital products. Analytical skills, leadership and knowledge of agile methodologies are required.

title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a frontend developer with experience in React, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. Experience in performance optimization and web accessibility is valued.

title: Backend Developer
description: We are looking for a backend developer with experience in Node.js, Express and NoSQL databases. Knowledge of microservices architecture is required.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: We are looking for a machine learning engineer with experience in prediction models and data processing. Knowledge in TensorFlow, PyTorch and MLOps is valued.

title: QA/Automation Engineer
description: We are looking for a QA/Automation engineer with experience in testing automation using tools like Selenium, Cypress or Playwright. Knowledge in CI/CD is desired.

title: System Administrator
description: We are looking for a system administrator with experience in Linux, Docker and server monitoring. Knowledge in scripting Bash or Python is a plus.

title: Scrum/Agile Master
description: We are looking for a Scrum/Agile master with experience in agile methodologies and management of multidisciplinary teams. Scrum Master certification is desirable.

title: Technical Support Level 2
description: We are looking for a technical support engineer with skills in incident resolution, networking and operating systems. Attention to detail and excellent customer service are required.
